name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Automation Engineer with 13+ years of experience, adept at crafting high-performance, automated solutions. Proficient in **n8n**, REST API integration, OAuth authentication, and webhooks, with strong expertise in JavaScript, SQL, and ETL processes. Demonstrated ability to leverage automation best practices while enhancing workflow efficiency using tools like **Airtable**, **HubSpot**, **Slack**, **Notion**, and **Stripe**. Skilled in problem-solving and effective communication, facilitating seamless project execution and collaboration.

Bringing hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development with **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, as well as cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**. Well-versed in building AI/ML-powered platforms and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines, aligning solutions with compliance-driven standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
